note: I write about what happens at the edge between the unknown & the impossible. Science journalist for 20+ years & SFF author at Scientific American, The New York Times, The Washington Post, Science, Nature, Popular Science, Inside Science, Live Science, New Scientist, American Scientist, The Scientist, Spectrum, IEEE Spectrum, Analog & more. In my spare time, I have ventured to seven continents and hold the rank of yondan in the Toyama-ryu battodo style of Japanese swordsmanship.
